title: Spirit Riding Free: Ride Along Adventure
director: Allan Jacobsen, Beth Sleven, Kevin Wotton

desc: Join Lucky and her friends on an interactive mission to save Maricela’s beloved mare from greedy horse thieves who've taken her captive with a wild herd.
